name: War Of Valhalla
description:
Welcome to War Of Valhalla. Innovative game of Classic Match-3 and Role-Playing games: summon epic heroes, build your own magical castle and join exciting PVP raids with players from all over the world!

Features:
Match 3 - Classic match 3 puzzle game! Casual, Simple, and Strategically!
Summon - Collect rare, epic and legendary heroes and super troops!
Upgrade - Level up your heroes, castle and buildings to get special powers!
Build - Barracks, alchemy factory, and huge city walls!
Graphics - Hundreds of independent mythology scenes, complete missions, and get treasure chests!
Social - Play with millions of global players and build alliance together.
Alliance - Call on allies to defeat the Super Titan!
Arena - Lead your team to challenge players from the whole world, improve your ladder ranking.
Explore - Endless events that give free items. You can participate multiple times regardless of your time zone.

Follow Us:
